segments.text: I'm not feeling well , doctor . I have a sore throat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you any aches and pains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take your temperature . How long have you been feeling ill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It began the night before last .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a temperature , but it's nothing serious . It's probably just the flu . I'll give you a prescription . Take this to the chemist's . Take one tablet every four hours . You should stay in bed tom
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lots of people are ill at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's this cold weather we're having .
segments.speaker: S1
